text: The Sandy Hook Elementary School shooting was a school shooting that happened in Connecticut, United States on December 14, 2012. Twenty-eight people were killed in the shooting, including many children and teachers and the perpetrator's mother at home. A few others were injured. ==Shooter== The shooter was Adam Lanza. He shot and killed his mother. He then went to Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Connecticut, and killed twenty children and six staff members as well as injuring two others. He committed suicide before he could be arrested by the Connecticut State Police. == Victims == === Fatalities === * Nancy Lanza, 51, (his mother; shot four times in the head) * Rachel D'Avino, 29, (teacher's aide) * Dawn Hochsprung, 47, (principal) * Anne Marie Murphy, 52, (teacher's aide) * Lauren Rousseau, 30, (teacher) * Mary Sherlach, 56, (school psychologist) * Victoria Leigh Soto, 27, (teacher) * Charlotte Bacon, 6 (student) * Daniel Barden, 7 (student) * Olivia Engel, 6 (student) * Josephine Gay, 7 (student) * Dylan Hockley, 6 (student) * Madeleine Hsu, 6 (student) * Catherine Hubbard, 6 (student) * Chase Kowalski, 7 (student) * Jesse Lewis, 6 (student) * Ana MÃ¡rquez-Greene, 6 (student) * James Mattioli, 6 (student) * Grace McDonnell, 7 (student) * Emilie Parker, 6 (student) * Jack Pinto, 6 (student) * Noah Pozner, 6 (student) * Caroline Previdi, 6 (student) * Jessica Rekos, 6 (student) * Avielle Richman, 6 (student) * Benjamin Wheeler, 6 (student) * Allison Wyatt, 6 (student) === Wounded === * Natalie Hammond, 40, (lead teacher) * Deborah Pisani ==References== Category:2012 crimes in the United States Category:2010s in Connecticut Category:2010s mass shootings in the United States Category:2010s murders in the United States Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in 2012 Category:Attacks on schools in the United States Category:Mass murder in 2012 Category:Massacres in the United States Category:Murder-suicides in the United States Category:Murders by firearm in the United States Category:Suicide in the 2010s Category:Suicides by firearm in the United States Category:Elementary school shootings in the United States Category:December 2012 events Category:People with anorexia
title: Sandy Hook Elementary School shooting
